name: ESPECTROids
description:
You have to cross a dangerous field of asteroids.

This simple game is from a programming article in Sinclair BASIC, published in issue 2 of Espectro, the Luso-Brazilian magazine of ZX Spectrum.

You can download the emulator .tap file. The source code is also available, you can open it with BasinC emulator (nice tool for Sinclair BASIC programming). The loading screen is also available.

More information can be obtained from here.

Controls: Selectable keys, default: z - Left   /   m - Right
